title: What are the best ways to earn money for science students? - Quora

response.answer_text: Since you have specifically mentioned that you are a science student, I presume you would want to do some work which is associated with science. Hence here is my pick 1. Helping students for projects and other technical activities.  Yes, there is always a market for this among the majority of the Indian Students. By helping them or creating them a project out of your science learning,  it would be really helpful for them and you can see some money too. To know how much to charge walk into a couple of project centres spread across all educational hubs and know the rates. Give a 25 percent discount and there you go !  2. Tutions Again sticking with science you can start to take Tutions for students in school level upto bachelor's level. This might seem to be a boring job, but the scope for this job is ever increasing. I have even heard a lady from Chennai taking Tutions for 5th class boy in Qatar. So its you to decide on going online or offline.  3. Share market  I think you know what this is all about. But be aware, you are never gonna be a millionaire by investing in shares, and this belief will one day make you a millionaire. 4. Content Writing  Get in touch with content writers and blog writing companies. Apply for a technical blogger freelancing opportunity. If you have good writing skills, your purse will surely start ringing.  I hope my idea would be helpful for you.

If you have interest in Stock Market Trading,then it is the fastest way to make huge money on the contrary it has chances of loosing too much money.But you can make money if you understand the Stock Market very well. Warren Buffet was named as the richest man in the world some years ago(Warren Buffet is a Stock Investor who started investing in stocks when he was a teenager). To start Trading follow the steps: 1.) Buy this Best Seller book called "The Intelligent Investor".2.) Start to invest your time in googling and learning from various websites and blogs about what trading is and always try to learn new things which will help you to gain more knowledge.3.)You can become a millionaire if you could use all your information to test out the stock market.4.)Join "Smart Stocks",it is a virtual platform to test your skills.Smart Stocks is a very good website to learn from because you are investing for virtual money,you can test all your skills there and if you start to taste  success then it is high time to start Real Trading.

Science students at least in India and always under pressure for submissions, practicals, journals, projects, self study etc, the best way to earn money is find something that will be between your college and classes. or something that can be done offtime. I think if you are good at writing then content writing is one, affiliate sales is another, it just needs one to be creative to match his available time and the work he wants to do.
